elements.label: Petsitter
elements.description: This one has an affinity with pets. They could accept to keep one of mine for a while, for a small fee.

elements.label: Petsitter: Already Petsitting
elements.description: This one is already petsitting one of my little companions.

elements.label: <A Furry Companion>
elements.description: <We left our furry companion in the company of this person for a bit.>
